author: dragonrider
title: It's My First Post On Steemit, Hope Me and My Dear Dragon Gets A Warm Welcome
body:
Hello Steemians, It's nice to be here finally. I summoned the courage to write my first post today. I have tried several times to write this post earlier but I just kept telling myself "boy, don't you think you've got to learn the rope? You've got to learn and study how things are done here a lil'bit more". Whenever I hear that voice in my head I would say maybe not today and just clear whatever I have typed, intending to post. 

So, basically I have been looking around here for some time now,  doing nothing but watching. Today again, I was watching as usual, suddenly something came over me and I said to **Draco** my dear dragon, boy,  let's ride straight into Steemit,  and here we are.
___
## How I Got To Know About Steemit
I stumbled on Steemit by chance, it was a typical chance encounter. I was making research about cryptocurrencies online and Viola! Steemit popped up, I clicked on the link, found myself on Steemit website, read the FAQ, the White and Blue Papers and explored everything there is to explore. 
Steemit is an uncharted territory to me and I hope to meet awesome people here and make great friends. 
![dragon rider banner.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUdt2getgbrWGRPLNdrBqyksCA5bZQkq1GaRMjqZAy4Yg/dragon%20rider%20banner.jpg) Artwork by me
___
# About Me
My name is **Dramirs**, a dragon lord from the ancient city of **Drakul** in a planet where Dragons roam freely on the streets as your pets do in this place you call **World**
But here in your world,  they call me Prince,  from the noisy city of Lagos,  Nigeria.  Oh Lagos!  What a city! 
![dragonrider image.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmc8RtCWEJp3UtftFAgryeQ43AmDKMuL6LaN2tUDMnxT1q/dragonrider%20image.jpg)
___
## What Do I Do
Since it's impossible to freely ride dragons or fight dragon wars in this world of yours, I tooked to one of the mundane professions I deemed lovely enough, Hence,  I'm a **Graphics Designer**.
___
I love everything Art and Designs, that's what my entire being on this mundane planet is dedicated to. 
If I'm not riding my Dragon, I'm either working on a design or writing some great story 
###  What to expect from me
If you're a lover of fantasies, you've gotten yourself a new friend. I'll take you on a ride with me into my world of fantasy, where you get to meet those fierce and friendly creatures -the **Dragons**. 
You'll get to know about their world, their wars and their conquests and defeats. 
#### Is that all?... No
That's not all,  I'm a guy who has something for everyone, no matter who you are. I'll always have something interesting for you. 
As Graphics designer,  I'll be sharing with you awesome designs and how you can create them yourself. 
I'll be sharing with you beautiful adventure stories, fictions and myths. 
As an art lover, I'll make you see the beauties in art.  **Art is life**


___
# I hope me and **Draco** my dear dragon üêâ receives a warm welcome on Steemit. 
___
# We say thank you for dropping by. We're very glad to meet you, and we'll love to be your friend
___
![dragonrider badge.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQAa2JqHW1RG1Sk8cgZhqkyq8mvFd9wbmq6GAyRGwavNn/dragonrider%20badge.jpg)
Artwork by me

title: My Cover Image Design For Steem-Plus

![Bug.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513694254/cqatxmvgi9nr1be4d51p.jpg) ___ The three dots drop-down menu does not auto hide as it should after an item has been clicked on the menu ___ ![Screenshot_20171219-154332.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513694752/tvzgf2u3ja2akhfs3kl9.png) ___ When clicked, the drop down list appears ![Screenshot_20171219-135001.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513694889/fpgrdsi0bpqlf5riao74.png) ___ After clicking on "New Contribution", an item on the list, the list won't Auto-hide as it should, thereby obstructing the screen. ![List not auto-hiding on Firefox.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513695173/y4txenmufgacwt2kpvhn.jpg) The New Contribution link appears in color blue, which means it has been clicked on. ___ The error still occurred when I tried with a different browser. ![List not auto-hiding on Chrome.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513695096/fq5zj6qyfjffatx8lagl.jpg) ___ I tried with three different browsers : Chrome browser, version 63.0.3239.111(Latest Version) Firefox browser, version 57.0.1(Latest version) Opera browser, version 44.1.2246.123029(Latest version) On my Infinix 4 , Android 6.0(Marsmallow) Phone. ___ All images are screen grabs from my phone. ___ I hope the bug is fixed as soon as possible.

body:
![Bug.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513696654/joyho0mfskieu2dtajpb.jpg) After the recent Utopian update, I discover that the contribute Button at the top of the page is no more working. Initially, I thought it was a browser issue, I switched to several browsers but the bug still persist. ___ ![Contribute button not working on Firefox.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513696894/up6fhvd13ljxp1qqcrm5.jpg) # On Firefox browser. ___ ![Contribute button not working on Chrome.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513696965/xpmyxbbxobulgiopacct.jpg) # On Opera browser ___ ___ I had to use the three dots drop-down menu before I could post my contribution. ![contribute working on through three dots.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513697074/t5kyrrrrin723wl8r3ve.jpg) ___ I hope the bug is fixed as soon as possible. ___ Here is my phone and browsers info: Phone: Infinix hot 4, Android version 6.0(Marshmallow) Browsers: Firefox Browser version 57.0(Latest Version) Opera browser version 44.1.2246.123029(Latest version)

title: Suggestion: Utopian Should Add Sub-categories To The Graphics Category
body:
![Suggestion.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513697904/bxvcrrmut3qkov8dx0ki.jpg) ___ It will be very nice if the graphics category could be broken down into Sub-categories thereby making the graphics category more organized. ___ ![Graphics Category.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513698196/wzhpuvjf1wwq21mrjtnq.jpg) ___ The graphics category is currently jam-packed with various contents, grouping all related content into Sub-categories will bring the much needed ororganisation to the graphics category . ___ ### Having a drop-down like this to choose from while posting in the graphics category will be good ![Graphics Caregory Drop-down.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513698319/cysiw2n88cvdhayxlbcl.jpg) ___ ### A drop-down like this while browsing the graphics ccategory will be very nice ![Graphics Caregory Drop-down 2.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513698440/ppqhfxomxydz4kr8pogx.jpg)

body:

title: Add "Number Of Views", "Estimated Time Left To Payout" and "Download" Features To Steepshot Mobile App
body:
![Steepshot Suggestion.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513853211/ehnty3fjgojaz8qbrhau.jpg) ___ Good day, First of all, I will like to give kudos to the developers of The Steepshot Mobile App, they are really doing a great job. There is one essential feature that the Steepshot Mobile App doesn't have currently, Users can know the numbers of views their pictures garner . It will be great if tte number of views a picture has gotten could be displayed on the steepshot Mobile App. ### Here is a screen grab of how posted pictures are currently displayed on the steepshot Mobile App ![Views 1.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513853854/rlthyjnpgg3i2cqpffh0.jpg) ___ ### I suggest we have something like this ![Views 2.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513853945/k0gbi02nkornbs5a7tsg.jpg) ___ ### The number of views could also be represented by an eye icon like this: ![views 3.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513854050/the0hbyevbhfhfb274bi.jpg) ___ # Secondly On the Steepshot Mobile App currently, users can't know the time left to payout of their posts. To know the estimated time left to payout, users have to log on to steemit. ![Payout 1.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513855406/udilav4cdjtgikzbm4ru.jpg) ___ I want to suggest adding a feature to the Steepshot Mobile App such that when Users tap on the the value of money a particular picture has garnered, the estimated time left to payout will pop-up. ### I suggest we have something like this when the value of money of a post is tapped on on the App ![Payout 2.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513855548/rtn43dnbslowgzsrn1mg.jpg) ___ # Thirdly I want to suggest that a feature is added to the steepshot Mobile App, whereby users can easily download pictures they like unto their phones' gallery. Currenty, users can't download photos from the Steepshot Mobile App unto their phone's. Adding this feature to the Steepshot Mobile App will allow users to save any particular photo they love or wish to have on their mobile phones easily ___ #### Currently if users tap on the three dot menu at the top of any photo on the App, we have this: ![save picture 1.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513856669/whvy54sfoodidpeg6qfg.jpg) ![Screenshot_20171220-013526.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513856705/qbbcchvhtb6axvbeuyux.png) ___ #### I suggest "Save" is added to the options, so that we have something like this: ![save picture 3.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1513856796/a1gv2f1yr7uvp5gdrvr7.jpg) ___ ###### This way, users can easily download any photo of their choice. ___ I hope the features are added very soon to the Steepshot Mobile App. Thanks

title: Add Private Account Feature And Display Users Wallet On The Steepshot Mobile App
body:
![Steepshot Suggestion.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514497071/h5muncc5mcgulrdy7fjy.jpg) Good day, I want to suggest that two features are added to the Steepshot Mobile App. # Firstly, I want to suggest that the "Private Account" feature is added to the Steepshot Mobile App. Adding this feature to the App means that only followers of a any particular user can view his posted contents. This will go a long way in solving the problem of spammers making random comments of users posts, since only the users followers will see their posts, spammers will have no opportunity on making useless comments on users posts. ### This is the default settings tab of the App: ![Screenshot_20171228-201711.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514497721/m9doiysnhqhkbge1zzgc.png) ### I suggest users have the option of making their accounts private like this: ![private account.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514497829/vycpihkcz4vq65h1rjbp.jpg) ___ # Secondly, I want to suggest that users Wallet are displayed on their profiles on the App, instead of the "Account Balance" being displayed currently on the App. The account balance being displayed can be confusing. It will be much better if users account worth in Steem Power, Steem and SBD are being displayed on the App separately. ### This is how users account are being displayed currently on the App: ![Screenshot_20171228-200928.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514498163/du6udyo8r0j5rx4a8bib.png) ### I suggest that the users account worth is displayed this way on the app: ![Account worth (1).png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514498221/d3p2eabhxzxnb7demaok.jpg) ___ I hope this features are added to the Steepshot Mobile App soonest. Thanks.

body:
![Steepshot Suggestion.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514664818/zvsyduyyjai2yofckuls.jpg) At one point or the other, We've all made mistakes while posting our contents online. Be it typographical errors, using wrong tags, using different titles, and so on. All we just have to do is the edit the post and make necessay corrections -That is the beauty of the Post Editing feature, Currently on the steepshot mobile app, this feature is not available. Users can't edit their posts once they tap on the "publish" button Adding the post editing feature to the App will make it possible for the users to edit their posts and correct any error they might have committed while creating the posts. # I suggest that the "Edit Post" option is added to the "three dot menu" at the top of the posts ![Screenshot_2017-12-30-15-18-19 menu.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514665452/mabwinkhncwtwedi6xq6.jpg) # Here are the current options available from the menu ![Screenshot_2017-12-30-15-18-33.png](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514665520/xj7cdnlrmtyufxx7mtvy.png) # I suggest that the "edit post" option is added this way ![Screenshot_2017-12-30-15-18-33 edit.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514665573/sb1wlyy3vurrcbjrnwft.jpg) ___ This way, users will be able to edit their posts easily. This will enable the users to keep track of the number of their followers. The followers notification system is available on all other social media apps, adding this feature to the Steepshot Mobile App will also help the app keep up with its contemporaries. ##### Currently, number of users' followers is displayed on their profile like this: ![Screenshot_20180101-180907.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514829087/up6i5idkksoqmxdvszi2.jpg) ##### I suggest that users are notified by an indicator on their followers number to alert them that they have a new follower, this way: ![Screenshot_20180101-184149.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514829164/o7xfdbgvu2i01c7cytmm.jpg) This way, users will readily know whenever they have a new follower. Thanks.

author: dragonrider
title: Add "Story" Feature To The Steepshot Mobile App
body:
![zvsyduyyjai2yofckuls.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514894340/l9ldtvrcoddjafdjjkhq.jpg) The story feature is a feature common to all social media apps. The feature is very useful because every content the users share as a story will always be seen by all their followers because the stories are always pinned at the top of the feed. Adding the story feature to the Steepshot Mobile App will enable users share important contents or pass important information to all their followers such that none of their followers will miss the post because it will be pinned at the top of the feed. ### The feed of the Steepshot Mobile App currently appears this way: ![Screenshot_20180102-130900.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514895320/ackbucj6zbtulgr7e70e.jpg) ### I suggest that stories are displayed this way: ![Screenshot_20180102-131453.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1514895384/xqwzevrmljo8t05hjsdv.jpg) This way, users of the Steepshot Mobile App will be assured that all their followers will see their contents when the shared them as stories. Thanks.

body:
I want to suggest that a change is made in the Rocket.Chat Mobile App such that users of the app can easily edit their profiles on the App without logging on to the web app. Currently for users to edit their profiles, they have to access Rocket.Chat via the web. title: Add "Tag Following" Feature To Steepshot Mobile App
body:
![zvsyduyyjai2yofckuls.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515057933/imhdp34szp4kppjrlsyk.jpg) ___ # Introduction ### What is Tag Following? Tag following is a feature in which users can follow a tag or tags of their interest just like they are following another user. When a user is following a particular tag, any content posted under that tag will appear on his feed. For instance, as a designer if I follow the #design tag, every content posted with the "design" tag will automatically appear on my feed. Just like the contents of other users I'm following are shown on my feed. # Why is the tag following feature essential? Adding the Tag Following feature to the Steepshot Mobile App will save users the hassles of having to go through "search" to browse through their tags of interest. The feature will bring users' tags of interest right into their feeds. ## Suggested design: When users search for a tag, they should have the option of following the tag as shown. ![Screenshot_20180104-105047.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515059779/k0qacwxc55utt5rnmi0s.jpg) ![Screenshot_20180104-105146.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515060086/c7funtuv1lowhmrdqujh.jpg) ___ I hope the tag following feature is added to the Steepshot Mobile App soonest so that users can easily follow their tags of interest. author: dragonrider
title: Increase The Maximum Size of File That Can Shared On The Rocket.Chat Mobile App
body:
# Introduction One of the most important features of mobile messenger apps is their file sharing abilities. Users can easily send pictures, gif images, voice notes and others. The file sharing feature makes communication much more better and interesting. # The Problem ![Screenshot_20180105-233910.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515240471/hfrcg8dmxrycbfhfiojz.jpg) ![Screenshot_20180106-130933.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515240626/zvasx2yzwvyhqgec2l17.jpg) Currently, the Rocket.Chat Mobile App only supports a maximum of 2MB file transfer which is not that useful for the users because a picture (one of the most shared file type) of a good quality has an average size of 3.5MB, other files such as PDFs, and videos even has higher sizes. This makes the 2MB maximum file transfer limit render the file sharing feature of the Rocket.Chat Mobile App close to being useless. # My Suggested Solution I suggest that the developers work on the Rocket.Chat Mobile App to increase the maximum size of file that can be shared on the App to something like 15MB. This way, users can easily share files and communicate effectively on the App. Thanks.
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

Adding an equalizer to vanillar music player will give users the opportunity to adjust the frequency of the audio produced by the music player to their taste. For instance, users who love high bass can adjust the equalizer to boost the bass. Users call also adjust the equalizer to produce various effects such as rock, heavy metal, classic, hip-hop, etc. #### My suggested design: I suggest that an equalizer is equalizer is added to Vanilla music player, which users can access via the settings tab as shown: ###### Current Vanilla Music Player settings tab. ![Screenshot_20180107-222631.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515362364/hycgfpzarroytyvkgifx.jpg) ___ ###### Vanilla music player with equalizer on the settings tab. ![Screenshot_20180107-225837.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515362461/tvbjsxmywa4quspyamqi.jpg) ___ I hope an equalizer is added to Vanilla Music player soonest so that users can easily modify the sound being produced by the music player to their tastes. title: Add Feature To Set A Currently Playing Song As Ringtone To Timber Player
body:
![Screenshot_20180107-232020.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515367132/khywwisfb1qbmceh43h6.jpg) # Introduction Many a times when users are listening to music on a music player app, they fall in love with a particular song and want to immediately set it as their ring tone. ![Screenshot_20180108-003546.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515368224/rmaa5w8gd9ipmfwet1yd.jpg) This is when the "set as ring tone" feature comes handy on music player apps. This feature enables users of a music player app to set the current playing song as their ringtone right inside the app. Unfortunately, this feature is not available on Timbre Player. # Why is the "set as ring tone" feature essential to Timber player? Adding this feature to Timber player will save users the hassles of going through file manager to search for a particular song before they can set it as their ringtone. It will enable them set any song of their choice as the ringtone right in Timber Player. # My Suggestion I suggest that the "Set as ringtone" option is added to the options on the drop-down menu of Timber Player. ###### Current options on Timber Player menu ![Screenshot_20180107-232425.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515368714/fshqn9vzebka8seaxnpk.jpg) ___ ___ ###### Set as ringtone on the options ![Screenshot_20180108-004133.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515368791/v9gjzekzaupxidxdumtn.jpg) ___ With the "set as ringtone" feature on Timber player, users can easily set any song as their ringtone right in the comfort of the App. Thanks. ___ ## All pictures are screenshots from my mobile phone.

author: dragonrider
title: Add Sort By Location Option To Camera Roll App
body:
# Introduction With the inception of location tagging on cameras and camera apps on mobile phones, it is now possible tag pictures taken at particular location with the location name. With the location tagging features on cameras and camera apps came the "sort by location" option on most gallery apps. # What Is "Sort By Location" Feature Present on almost all the gallery viewer apps of the present day, the sort by location options groups all pictures with the same location tag together so that that they can be viewed together as if they the pictures were in the same folder. Currently on the Camera Roll App, the sort by location option is not available. There are only three sorting options, sort by name, size or date![Screenshot_20180110-205644.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515618638/gw5ph7gfmcznggxgcgfx.jpg) # My Suggestion I suggest that the "sort by location" option is added to Camera Roll App ![Screenshot_20180110-223139.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515619920/hk5erx3uuywqnxhgm4z1.jpg) Adding the sort by location option will make it easy for users to access or view pictures with the same location tag without the hassles of combing through the entire gallery to sort the pictures manually. Thanks. # All pictures are screenshots from my mobile phone.
Posted on Utopian.io - Rewarding Open Source Contributors

title: Add Photo Editing Feature To Camera Roll App
body:
#### Intro The photo editing feature is an integral and indispensable feature of a good camera and gallery app. This feature makes it easy for users to edit their images on the go on the camera/gallery app. #### The Problem Currently users can not edit their photos in the Camera Roll App, The only editing users can do on the App is to resize their images. Users can't do real editing like adding filters to their images, adjusting the brightness and exposure, adding frames, etc. ###### When users open an image on the Camera Roll App and tap on the edit icon, they are directed to choose which app they want to choose for the editing, if they select the Camera Roll App, the only task they can perform is to resize the image: ![Screenshot_20180112-195332.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515784228/chzqk8uqidxqllqzf6jb.jpg) ![Screenshot_20180112-200658.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515784259/hsdwpx646ov59himm6xx.jpg) ![Screenshot_20180112-201410.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515784462/cf9frcr0lmlaidvq0nmk.jpg) ![Screenshot_20180112-195231.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515784524/gtgweebsteqdsvppbbdu.jpg) #### My Suggestion I want to suggest that a good inbuilt image editor is added to the Camera Roll App, such that users can edit their images; apply filters, make colour corrections, etc, right on the App. ##### Like this editor on a gallery app: ![Screenshot_20180112-201937.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515785147/b7ysxen4jf4hdy7uqyvb.jpg) ![Screenshot_20180112-201949.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515785178/hzvdnqwzypsvgj7sgahx.jpg) ![Screenshot_20180112-202019.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1515785195/zbh25n9ht3okz6nu8h8i.jpg) #### Benefits Adding an inbuilt photo editor to Camera Roll App will make it easy for users perform editing tasks right on the App without the hassles of launching a third party app for their image editing. This feature will also help grow the user base of the App because it will encompass everything users want from a gallery app. Thanks. ###### All images are screenshots from my mobile phone.
